subject: Implement fibonacci(n) — TDD GREEN
description:
**Type:** Task

Implement the `fibonacci(n)` function to make all fibonacci tests pass. Use tuple reduce: `Array.from({ length: n - 1 }).reduce<readonly [number, number]>(([prev, curr]) => [curr, prev + curr] as const, [0, 1])`.

Include:
- `validateNonNegativeInteger` private helper
- `MAX_SAFE_N = 78` constant
- Input validation throws RangeError with received value: `"Expected a non-negative integer for n, got ${String(n)}"`
- n > 78 throws: `"fibonacci(n) exceeds Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER for n > 78"`
- JSDoc with @param, @returns, @throws
- File preamble JSDoc

**Verification:** `bun run test -- tests/unit/utils/fibonacci.test.ts --verbose` → All fibonacci tests PASS
